text: aur jab un logon ne apane apane asabaab khole to apanee apanee poonjee ko dekha ki (vaise hee) vaapas kar dee gaee hai to (apane baap se) kahane lage ai abba hamen (aur) kya chaahie (dekhie) yah hamaaree jama poonjee hamen vaapas de dee gayee hai aur (galla mupht mila ab ibne yaameen ko jaane deejie to) ham apane ehalo ayaal ke vaaste galla laaden aur apane bhaee kee pooree hiphaazat karegen aur ek baar yatar galla aur badhava laengen
